Title: Organized vehicle theft gang suspected in Kabwata area
Description: Intelligence suggests coordinated vehicle thefts targeting residential areas. Pattern indicates professional operation with chop shop suspected.
SuspectInformation: Multiple suspects, use white Toyota vehicles for reconnaissance
RecommendedAction: Increase patrols in residential areas, monitor known chop shops, brief patrol officers on vehicle descriptions

Title: Shoplifting trend at Kabwata Shopping Mall
Description: Retail theft incidents increasing at shopping mall. Multiple repeat offenders identified.
RecommendedAction: Coordinate with mall security, conduct patrols, identify repeat offenders
